pkgmetadata.longdescription: This provides a simple OpenRC service to check if the user has "disable_overscan=1" (uncommmented) in /boot/config.txt; if not, it creates a file in /usr/share/X11/xorg.conf.d/ to force software-based cursor blitting (this is to avoid the VC4 offset cursor issue with overscan, issue #17 (GitHub)). It also disables compositing for Xfce4 for all users.
